name: LawnMowerKids
description:
LawnMowerKids is a lawn mowing game that will have you control three kids on three different types of mowers, cutting grass while beating the clock in a stunning visual environment populated by engaging characters.

The game is action-packed, but still totally non violent, so it is suitable for players of all ages.

LawnMowerKids is an addictive, imaginative, and cutting-the-edge game and it should certainly beat the actual act of mowing a lawn.

★ Wonderful 1950's suburban environments.
★ 21 true-to-the 50ies lawns to mow.
★ Original Soundtrack.
★ Lots of humor.
★ Avoid cats, dogs, flower settings, football players, party guests and grumpy old Joe.
★ Collect Mr. Mowman's coveted medals by beating set times for each level.
★ Increasing difficulty - increasing pace.

And remember, even if the grass is greener on the other side you still have to mow it!
